resources.string:
Welcome! This application is designed to help you understand potential risk factors associated with developing dental caries (cavities).

By answering a series of questions based on established indicators, this app provides an informational score. Our goal is to empower you with knowledge and encourage proactive steps towards maintaining good periodontal health and preventing cavities.

Please Note: This app is for informational purposes only and does not provide medical advice. Always consult with a qualified healthcare professional for any health concerns or before making any decisions related to your health.
Risk score is approximated using data from the 35+ age group due to data limitations. Results are an estimate and may not be fully precise for your profile.
We couldn\'t proceed because information for the indicator \"%1$s\" is missing. Please ensure all required fields are completed.
